assessment.description: No chaos engineering tests exist in CI or as standalone test suites.
recommended_chaos_scenarios: Upstream LLM provider timeout → verify fail-closed receipt
Receipt store unavailable → verify no silent data loss
Memory pressure during ProofGraph traversal → verify deterministic error
Network partition during SwarmPDP batch evaluation → verify fail-closed

rationale: HELM's fail-closed architecture provides inherent resilience. Chaos testing would add confidence but is not blocking.
